title: A Green Squid Kid's Arts n' Crafts
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:magnus-web-format]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "Anomalous Animal Healthcare";
    --header-subtitle: "Vets for the really really exotic pets";
--logo-image: url("http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/agreensquidkid/AHHdept%20logo.png");`

    --pale-accent: 165, 119, 190;
    /* light red, for visited links */
    --bright-accent: 171, 52, 84;
    /* bright red */
    --medium-accent: 165, 119, 190;
    /* medium red - the "default" accent color */
    --dark-accent: 71, 52, 84;
    /* dark red */
    --alt-accent: 71, 52, 84;
    /* pale orange, for newpage links */
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png) center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ A Green Squid Kid's Art Page
----
+++ THIS FILE REQUIRES LEVEL 69 AUTHORIZATION.
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Sorry for the gross watermarks, but I posted many of these on Reddit and people on Reddit steal art like kindergartners to a plate of pizza rolls** 

[[collapsible show="+ Animations" hide="- Animations"]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/049%20flying|align=center|caption= SCP-049 evolves to his final form
    ]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/682%20roar|align=center|caption= "I've only known SCP-079 for a day and a half, but if anything happened to him, I would kill everyone in this room and then myself."
    ]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/cimm.gif|align=center|caption= You are so wrong that Dr. Cimmerian loses consciousness
    ]]

> I have a whole bunch more SCP related animations on my Youtube channel, [[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJXuqGmPoylQqAWTN-a93g?view_as=subscriber|which I will shamelessly self-promote here.]]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP Art" hide="- SCP Art"]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/scp049%20skull|caption= X-ray
    ]]
~~~~
[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/day%20broke|align=left|caption= I had a nightmare about S.D. Locke's Proposal, so I drew some art inspired by it.
    ]]
~~~~
[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/pfp|align=right|caption= Here's my pfp on the wiki.
    ]]
~~~~

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/cursed.png|caption= The SCP Foundation if it was some obscure cartoons from the 80s|align=left
    ]]
~~~~

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/u%20goin%20to%20brazil.png|align=right|caption= u goin to brazil
    ]]
~~~~

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Dr. Green" hide="- Dr. Green"]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/Dr%20green.png|align=center|caption= In universe me haha weee
    ]]

> Dr. Green was a character in my skip, [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5731| SCP-5731 Dolittle's Music Box]]]. And now she's my in-universe persona ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/the%20chris%20pratt%20dinosaur%20thing.jpg|align=center|caption= this is what she does for a living
    ]]
[[/collapsible]]

**Bork Foundation**

    caption=SCP-096 (Greyhound) |align=left|
    ]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/106%20dog|
    caption=SCP-106 (Doberman) |align=left|
    ]]

    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/035%20dog|
    caption=SCP-035 (Actual mask is a Pharaoh Hound. D-class is non-descript mutt) |align=left|
    ]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/a-green-squid-kid-s-arts-n-crafts/049%20dog.png|

    ]]
~~~~
